title: Career & Leadership Coaching ‚Äì Dr Ian Henry
text:
Dr Ian Henry








Career & Leadership Coaching


From Research to Leadership  Build clarity, confidence, and impact




1. Overview

I offer personalised career and leadership coaching for professionals in science, technology, and data-driven fields.
Drawing on 15+ years of experience across academia and industry ‚Äî from research at the Max Planck Institute and AstraZeneca to leading international teams ‚Äî I help clients navigate transitions, develop authentic leadership, and align their careers with their strengths and values.
My approach combines evidence-based coaching, strategic insight, and reflective practice to support growth in demanding, complex environments.
Coaching helps you: - Build leadership presence and confidence
- Clarify career direction and long-term goals
- Strengthen communication, influence, and decision-making
- Navigate transitions between roles, sectors, or stages
- Develop resilience and focus for sustainable success



2. Coaching Services


Career Coaching  

Define your career vision and direction

Navigate transitions, promotions, or career changes

Strengthen your professional identity and confidence

Align your work with your values and long-term goals



Leadership Coaching  

Develop your leadership style and authentic voice

Build influence and communication across teams

Manage complexity, decision-making, and strategic focus

Lead with empathy, clarity, and purpose



Personal & Professional Growth  

Increase self-awareness and emotional intelligence

Overcome imposter syndrome or perfectionism

Build resilience and balance in high-performance settings

Turn reflection into actionable growth





3. Who I Work With


Scientists & Data Professionals  

Transitioning into leadership or management roles

Moving from academia to industry or hybrid positions

Developing communication and influence beyond technical expertise



Academics & Researchers  

Building leadership within research teams or departments

Preparing for tenure, promotion, or sector transition

Enhancing visibility and strategic career planning



Mid- to Senior-Level Professionals  

Refining leadership approach and presence

Aligning career choices with long-term goals

Managing growth, uncertainty, and professional balance





4. Coaching Approach


Tailored & Reflective  

One-to-one sessions shaped around your context and goals

Structured frameworks for self-reflection and progress tracking

Focus on clarity, confidence, and sustainable growth



Evidence-Based & Practical  

Draws from leadership psychology and behavioural science

Grounded in real-world experience leading interdisciplinary teams

Turns insight into actionable strategies for growth and impact



Sustained Development  

Ongoing accountability and tailored feedback

Optional integration with mentoring for technical professionals

Flexible engagement options ‚Äî from short intensives to long-term partnerships





5. Get in Touch


Arrange a Session 
Ready to start your coaching journey?
Contact me to discuss your goals, book your first session, or explore a customised coaching plan.
üìß Email: coaching@drianhenry.co.uk
üåê Book online: Contact Form ‚Üí


Flexible Coaching Formats 

Online sessions via Zoom or Teams

Short-term (3‚Äì6 sessions) or long-term coaching engagements

Optional integration with mentoring for scientists and data professionals



Next Steps 

Initial consultation to define objectives and priorities

Tailored programme built around measurable outcomes

Continuous reflection and feedback for lasting growth






Bridging Tutoring & Coaching 


Coaching builds on mentoring ‚Äî shifting from what to learn to how to lead and grow.
It supports the transition from academic or technical expertise to confident, authentic leadership.


Explore Tutoring & Mentoring ‚Üí
